name: Cheat Night
description:
My submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme: "Roll of the Dice"

This is a strategy game where your goal is to distract your friends from looking at the game board, so you can tamper with the dices in order to win the game. But be careful! Because your friends will start to suspect you!

Can you get to the finish before the game ends? Will your friends not hate you after this? Who knows...

It´s a normal game night, right?
